headline.main: Hemingway's Havana Home to Get $900,000 in US Improvements
headline.print_headline: Hemingway's Havana Home to Get $900,000 in US Improvements

docs.snippet: A U.S. foundation will ship nearly $900,000 in supplies to build a state-of-the-art facility to preserve Ernest Hemingway's books, letters and photos — the first major export of construction materials to Cuba since President Barack Obama loo...
docs.lead_paragraph: A U.S. foundation will ship nearly $900,000 in supplies to build a state-of-the-art facility to preserve Ernest Hemingway's books, letters and photos — the first major export of construction materials to Cuba since President Barack Obama loosened the trade embargo on the island.

headline.main: Stanley Kubrick Script 'The Downslope' to Be Made a Trilogy

docs.snippet: An old screenplay by Stanley Kubrick is being developed as a trilogy by "World War Z" director Marc Forster....
docs.lead_paragraph: An old screenplay by Stanley Kubrick is being developed as a trilogy by "World War Z" director Marc Forster.

headline.main: A Quintessential American Ballerina Hangs Up Her Toe Shoes
headline.print_headline: A Quintessential American Ballerina Hangs Up Her Toe Shoes

docs.snippet: Juliet's death is always a sad moment at the ballet. But it's safe to say there were lots more tears than usual when Julie Kent splayed her limber body backward across that cold stone slab in the Capulet crypt over the weekend — for one last...
docs.lead_paragraph: Juliet's death is always a sad moment at the ballet. But it's safe to say there were lots more tears than usual when Julie Kent splayed her limber body backward across that cold stone slab in the Capulet crypt over the weekend — for one last time.

headline.main: Q&A: What's at Stake in Supreme Court Gay Marriage Case
headline.print_headline: Q&A: What's at Stake in Supreme Court Gay Marriage Case

docs.lead_paragraph: Just two years ago, the Supreme Court struck down part of the federal anti-gay marriage law that denied a range of government benefits to legally married same-sex couples.

headline.main: Serbia's Under-20 World Cup Winners Get Heroes' Welcome

docs.snippet: Around 50,000 elated fans treated Serbia's Under-20 football team to a royal homecoming on Monday after they returned from winning the World Cup with a 2-1 win over favourites Brazil....
docs.lead_paragraph: Around 50,000 elated fans treated Serbia's Under-20 football team to a royal homecoming on Monday after they returned from winning the World Cup with a 2-1 win over favourites Brazil.

headline.main: ESPN Says It Obtained Notebook Documenting Rose 1986 Bets

headline.main: Key Democratic Senators Back Plan for Trade Legislation
headline.print_headline: Key Democratic Senators Back Plan for Trade Legislation

docs.snippet: The U.S. Senate is headed toward showdown votes this week on legislation key to a Pacific trade pact, with some Democrats essential to passing the measure vowing to support it again and others undecided on whether to change their votes to oppose t...
docs.lead_paragraph: The U.S. Senate is headed toward showdown votes this week on legislation key to a Pacific trade pact, with some Democrats essential to passing the measure vowing to support it again and others undecided on whether to change their votes to oppose the bill.

headline.main: Virginia Woman Pleads to Trespassing at Will Smith's Home
headline.print_headline: Virginia Woman Pleads to Trespassing at Will Smith's Home

headline.main: Ebola Returns to Sierra Leone Capital After Three-Week Gap
headline.print_headline: Ebola Returns to Sierra Leone Capital After Three-Week Gap

docs.snippet: Sierra Leone has recorded two new cases of Ebola in Freetown in the past few days, disproving the assumption that the capital city had already defeated the deadly virus, officials said on Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Sierra Leone has recorded two new cases of Ebola in Freetown in the past few days, disproving the assumption that the capital city had already defeated the deadly virus, officials said on Monday.
